Posts.EditableText:
If you're talking about Quest, there's a built-in system for keeping a score.  Here is the place to find a quick overview in the documentation:
https://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/score_health_money.html

There are other places in the tutorials and documentation that talk more about it, like this more detailed page:

https://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/keeping_score.html

Here's hoping these help!
